abstract: In a Series D funding, Paracor Medical raised $44.35 million to complete a pivotal clinical trial of a device to prevent congestive heart failure, says TheDeal.com.
lead_paragraph: In a Series D funding, Paracor Medical raised $44.35 million to complete a pivotal clinical trial of a device to prevent congestive heart failure, says TheDeal.com.

headline.main: Paracor Raises $44 Million for Pivotal Trial
